subject: Order #SSN1689
description_text: Just wondering the status on shipping for my items. The tracking number provided no longer works for me on the website for the tracking company.

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Moorhead,     Sorry for the inconvenience, you can track it using this new link and it is expected to be delivered for you in the next couple of days. https://www.track718.us/zh-CN/detail?nums=JSEXR1995168050YQ
